1.title: Conversational Behavior Reasoning in Full-Duplex Speech
1.desc: A framework that enables reasoning over conversational behaviors by modeling this process as causal inference within a Graph-of-Thought (GoT).

2.title: Modal Improvisation (Instrument)
2.desc: Real-time MIDI functionality for a performance-ready instrument, built entirely in Max. Synth pad created from scratch using multichannel harmonics and versatile comb filtering.

3.title: AlumniDB
3.desc: Service to connect students with alumni, fostering meaningful connections between curious learners and insightful mentors.

4.title: 3-Stage Audio Amplifier
4.desc: 5.5x gain amplifier (2.4% THD) with a filter, gain, and output stage. Designed & tested in LTSpice and brought to life with spare parts.

5.title: Chord Structure Analyzer
5.desc: An algorithm in Python with music21 to process chord changes given a MusicXML file and analyze them, structurally, for real-time practice.
